channel.title: golang on Huanghuang's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in golang on Huanghuang's Blog

item.title: Golang安装
item.description: 安装 Platform: Centos7 version: 1.12 安装 1 2 3 cd /opt wget https://studygolang.com/dl/golang/go1.12.4.linux-amd64.tar.gz tar xzvf go1.12.4.linux-amd64.tar.gz # 安装 配置环境变量 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 vim ~/.zshrc # 如果用bash就是vim ~/.bashrc # 追加golang配置 export GOROOT=/opt/go export PATH=$PATH:$GOROOT/bin # 立即
